title: VERA FILES FACT CHECK: Pahayag ni Duterte tungkol sa kanyang sahod mali pa rin
subtitle: Muling minaliit ni Pangulong Rodrigo Duterte ang kanyang suweldo, ang ikaapat na pagkakataon na ginawa niya ito sa bilang ng VERA Files Fact Check.
author: www.verafiles.org
vclaim: Founded in March 2008, VERA Files is published by veteran Filipino journalists taking a deeper look into current Philippine issues. Vera is Latin for “true.”
